headline: Bryn Terfel Has Exited The Met’s ‘Dutchman’
abstract: The bass-baritone’s planned return to the company, after eight years, was canceled because of an ankle fracture.
lead_paragraph: In Wagner’s “Der Fliegende Holländer,” a bewitched sea captain is allowed to leave his ship only once every seven years, to try to break the spell that has condemned him to roam the oceans for eternity.
